title: Maui Fever
overview: What is life like when everyday is a vacation? Maui Fever explores the lives of several young Kaanapali, Maui locals who spend their days sunning and their nights partying with no rules and no one to answer to. This close knit group of friends navigate their way through life on the small island, juggle the revolving door of tourists while trying to maintain stable relationships and establish what they want for their future. The constant threat of temptation causes waves for Cheyne, Chaunte, Anthony, Anna, Corbin, Sean and Jesse who are just trying to make a good time out of life.
